entries.title: Elon Musk, astronaut Scott Kelly spar on Twitter over pronoun use
entries.description: Elon Musk got into a Twitter spat with former NASA astronaut Scott Kelly on Sunday after the billionaire entrepreneur appeared to take another high-profile

entries.title: Chappelle audience members describe Elon Musk being booed off stage: 'more boos than I’d ever heard'
entries.description: Three audience members who were at Dave Chappelle’s show where Elon Musk was booed off stage say Musk’s characterization of the night wasn’t fully accurate.
